title: Pixel 3 XL PIN locked out just after the restart of Android 10 update.
content:
My Pixel 3 XL locked me out just after the restart of Android 10 update.
PIN authentification never let me even I tapped the correct pattern.

And right now, the device automatically restarted, then went in the bootloader loop.
Recovery mode: not working.
Rescue mode: not working.
